title: 411. Is $2 Trillion the Right Medicine for a Sick Economy?
description: Congress just passed the biggest aid package in modern history. We ask six former White House economic advisors and one U.S. Senator: Will it actually work? What are its best and worst features? Where does $2 trillion come from, and what are the long-term effects of all that government spending?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
